titleStmt.title: The answer of the Convention of the Estates, to the remonstrance and desires of the Commissioners of the Generall Assembly, concerning the dangers of religion: with a second remonstrance of the Commissioners of the Generall Assembly, to the honourable Convention of Estates, concerning the remedies of the dangers of religion. July 6. 1643. At Edinburgh the 13. of July, 1643. Entred into the register book at Stationers Hall according to order,
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh, Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to Kings most Excellent Majesty, and reprinted at London for Tho: Vnderhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
